title: The Independent logo
content:
Does anybody know what it is?? Ive looked at Baskerville, but the serifs are wrong, ive looked at Bauer Bodoni, and all the Bodoni weights, but they are closer…

Its the E on the independent paper thats slightly different…??

Thanks Nick
author: Nickmulley

comments.content:
There’s no sample for us to see, Nick. Can you attach a .gif or .jpg picture of the font sample?

- Mike Yanega

[http://www.independent.co.uk/](http://web.archive.org/web/20070402132816/http:/www.independent.co.uk/)

If it’s the logo you’re after I am fairly sure that it is custom, I believe the Independent was redesigned by a Spanish agency when it reduced its size, but that the logo predates the redesign. If you want close you could look at Nick Shinn’s [Walburn](http://web.archive.org/web/20070402132816/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/shinn/walburn/) or search Didone on myfonts.com.  
Tim
